# ClawPrice

> Live token price tracker for the OpenClaw and Moltbook ecosystem.

ClawPrice (clawprice.io) provides real-time market data for public tokens in the OpenClaw and Moltbook ecosystem. Data is sourced from CoinGecko and auto-refreshes every 60 seconds.

## Pages

- [Home](https://clawprice.io/): Live token prices, market caps, 24h/7d changes, volume, and executive summaries for each token.
- [Feed](https://clawprice.io/feed.html): Ecosystem updates feed from @0xSammy and @bankrbot on X/Twitter.

## Features

- Real-time token prices with 60-second auto-refresh
- Executive summaries and research memos per token
- Market cap, FDV, volume, ATH/ATL data
- Dark and light mode support
- Mobile responsive design
- Token search and sorting
- Newly added token highlights

## Ecosystem

ClawPrice tracks tokens in the OpenClaw and Moltbook ecosystem including CLAWD, Moltbook, Clawnch, KellyClaude, Anti Hunter, FELIX, FOMOLT, Molt Bunker, ClawCloudX, Foundry4, and x402Guard.

## Built By

Khala Research (https://khala.io, https://x.com/khalaResearch)
